description: Ricky has been warned by his boss Derek Bolt that he needs to work on his attitude and his customer service. Being a pro-active boss, Mr. Bolt suggests an immediate training session to teach Ricky how to think of others first by making him sniff and worship his dress socks. Soon Ricky is anticipating Mr. Bolt’s needs and sucking on his hunky boss’ toes until he cums.
title: Boss Derek Bolt Foot Worshiped
